0.event: We met at the Café Charbon in Paris. An evening full of emotions!

1.event: Cécile starts living at Romain's place; she feels at home there after all.

2.event: First joint purchase: a Nintendo Switch. We love video games, or we don't!

4.event: We finally move in together, in the same building as Romain's previous apartment.

5.event: We celebrate our Civil Union at the 12th arrondissement City Hall! That's the logical continuation (and it's easier for tax returns).

6.event: After months of preparation, our boxes are packed and visas printed: we take our flight to the US!

7.event: After six intense weeks, we are finally settled in San Francisco!

8.event: Following some visa issues for Cécile, we decide to get secretly engaged on Venice Beach, Los Angeles.

9.event: We get married intimately in the San Francisco City Hall. Story goes that we had a brunch afterwards.

10.event: Cécile starts working at Ubisoft, and we become one of the company's many couples.

11.event: During our road trip in the National Parks, we mention getting married (again) to our close friends.

12.event: A year and a day after our San Francisco wedding, Romain proposes Cécile on top of a volcano in Hawaii.

13.event: We start thinking about moving back to France.

14.event: We discover the lockdown together, and it goes well!

15.event: We decide to move back to France by the end of the year, for various reasons.

16.event: Romain finds a new job in Paris, starting next January.

17.event: Last day in San Francisco, we're happy to move back to France!

18.event: We find our new apartment in Paris, and are very effective in settling in our new place.

19.event: It's Cécile's turn to find her new job, after a couple weeks of long due rest.
